text: This medical documentary was incredibly informative and well-made.
The documentary about vaccines was poorly researched and biased.
This political documentary presents a compelling and balanced view.
Politically biased propaganda disguised as a documentary.
An excellent educational film that teaches complex concepts clearly.
Boring educational content that fails to engage the audience.

Poor animation and a childish plot that even kids won't enjoy.

Slow-paced foreign film with subtitles that dragged on forever.

This short film felt incomplete and poorly edited.
A timeless classic that holds up remarkably well today.
This old film feels dated and the pacing is painfully slow.

Pretentious experimental nonsense that tries too hard to be artsy.
The sound design and cinematography are technically flawless.
Poor audio quality and shaky camera work ruined the experience.
Perfect binge-worthy content for a lazy weekend at home.
Not even worth the streaming service subscription fee.
